#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

//typedef char bool;
//#define true  1
//#define false 1

int main(int argc, char** argv)
{
	int N, X, Y, i, j;
	
	scanf("%d%d%d", &N, &X, &Y);
	
	int* a = (int*)calloc(N + 1, sizeof(int));

	for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		a[i]--;
	}
	
	int W = Y - X;
	if (W < 0) W = 0;

	//bool* d = (bool*)calloc(W + 1, sizeof(bool));
	vector<bool> d(W + 1 + 1, false);
	d[0] = true;

	for (i = 0; i < N && !d[W]; i++)
		for (j = a[i]; j <= W; j++)
			d[j] = d[j] | d[j - a[i]];

	if (d[W]) printf("POSSIBLE\n");
	else printf("IMPOSSIBLE\n");

	free(a); //free(d);
	return 0;
}
